lead_paragraph: Alex Rios homered off the struggling Danys Baez in the 10th inning, and Frank Thomas hit a milestone homer to help visiting Toronto rally for a 5-4 victory against Baltimore. Toronto trailed by 4-2 in the seventh before Thomas hit his 493rd career home run, tying Lou Gehrig and Fred McGriff for 21st on the career list. The bases-empty shot left him two homers short of matching Edgar Martinez for most by a designated hitter (243).
